name: Potato Defender
description:
This game was made for the #175 Trijam, whose theme was "Bring back potatoes".

Welcome to Potato Defender! You are in the middle of an unknown area, and your job is to defend your base against zombies. When you kill a zombie, there is a 50% chance it will drop a potato which you can pick up.

Bring the potatoes back to base and store them up as currency for you to upgrade yourself!

Reach as high a wave as you can!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move Around

Left Click - Shoot

G - Proceed to the Next Wave when the current wave is over

U - Use the Upgrade Menu

Credits:

Color Palette
